DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study evaluate new blood test way follow effect Zometa treat bone metastasis . The blood test look protein , call TRAP , release blood stream breakdown bone . This study compare TRAP blood test blood test bone destruction .
DOC.criteria: invasive lung cancer ( small cell nonsmall cell lung cancer ) osteolytic bone metastasis determine clinical exam , bone scan/XR age > 18 year concurrent malignancy second primary renal failure ( serum creatinine > 3mg/dl ) pregnancy active rheumatoid arthritis intolerance zoledronic acid
